name: toggle-kana-punctuation
title: Toggle Kana Punctuation
description: Easily switch between different punctuation styles (e.g., Japanese and Western) while typing in Japanese.
author: harusaku

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
